body.name: Avery Two Pocket Folders, Holds up to 40 Sheets, Business Card Slot, 25 Gray Folders (47990)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins
features: Create professional-looking two pocket folders as the heavy paper material features a matte finish and soft texture designed to hide marks and scuffs
Easily load and unload your pages with the open side notches and store up to 20 loose documents in each pocket
Personalize your folders with pockets and add a professional touch as the die-cut card slot located on the inside front pocket allows you to insert a business card
Easily write on or add a label to the front of your pocket folder to create a homework folder, a note organization folder, a project folder, a business portfolio folder, and more
The box includes 25 gray Avery folders
body.description: Organizing loose papers and creating a presentable folder doesn’t have to be complicated. Keep your documents well-organized and worth presenting with Avery Two Pocket Folders. These textured paper 8” x 11 ½” Avery folders feature two internal pockets designed to hold a variety documents including homework assignments, study sheets, class notes, business brochures, coupons and more. Whether you’re looking for school folders for the upcoming next semester, presentation folders for a trade show, or office folders to hold important project documents, these folders with pockets provide the convenience needed for easy organization. Load and unload documents at ease as each pocket corner includes built-in open side notches designed for easier access to your pages. Customize your memorable first-impression as these paper folders allow you to write on or add a label to its cover. Keep these gray two pocket folders looking clean as matte finish and soft texture helps hide marks and scuffs. Adding a professional touch to your pocket folders can be as simple as having a business card. For easy folder personalization, the die-cut card slot located on the inside front pocket allows you to insert your own business card. Each spacious pocket can hold up to 20 sheets of paper, making the folder capable of holding up to 40 documents. The box has 25 total pocket folders.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ORGANIZATION IS ESSENTIAL, WHEREVER YOU WORK. Avery folders help you organize your home office, virtual classroom or arts & crafts so you can be productive anywhere.

For School Organize projects and class reports, color-coding by semester or by subject For Work Route work, business reports, presentations, proposals and more For Home Store important papers like household, medical, financial and travel documents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Very Best of Second Best
reviews.reviewText: Are you too cheap to pay to have your presentation materials professionally printed and bound but still want those to whom you are presenting to understand that you are a professional who cares deeply about whatever you are presenting? Well, if so, I would like to suggest that these Avery Two-Pocket Folders are just the product for you. They are well made, pleasant to the touch, and are hefty enough to hold even the most robust of under-40 page presentations not worth having professionally printed and bound. True, folks may still question why you didn't just have the presentation spiral bound by a professional printer, but they won't be able to question your commitment to the very best of the second best. Indeed, they may very well take your presentation out of the folder, toss it in the trash where it most likely belongs if it wasn't worth professionally binding, and then use the folder for their own presentation needs of secondary importance. In that sense, you can think of these folder as perks for your potential clients.The only real downside is that Avery very cleverly embossed their own logo on the back of the folder. So your branding will be all muddled up with another major corporation's branding. They'd never get away with that on printing labels, but they somehow think that's okay on these folders. I called their home office to inquire about this, and they said that if I really cared about my branding I'd pay to have my presentation professionally printed and bound. Touché, Avery, touché. (Okay, I didn't actually call their home office, but I did imagine doing so vividly in my imagination and that was a very accurate account of what transpired.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price and Quality!
reviews.reviewText: I needed these folders to hand out to my clients. I am a Realtor so I wanted something durable and not cheap looking. These folders are perfect! They are durable, nice color, and also have a nice texture. I will definitely buy again. They are also at a great price!

reviews.reviewText: What an incredible value for the money! Makes for a great folders to return client documents. So much cheaper than alternatives, especially office supply houses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Good quality at a great price. I use these as folders to hold information for patients in my surgery practice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked for us
reviews.reviewText: Nice folders. We use them for business, and they work great. We were looking for two-pocket portfolios with a business card insert. These were perfect. Sturdy construction, not flimsy. Nice color. A great business tool. Wish they were lower priced, since we need so many of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok presentation folder but pockets a tad too small
reviews.reviewText: Folders are a decent weight, neutral and attractive grey color, but the interior pockets are just a tad too snug for easily inserting standard 8.5 x 11 paper. I planned to use these to insert papers for clients and often struggle to slip standard size papers in... the seams seem like they're glued too far or something...
